dmp.title: DMP test to evaluate the service

dataset.description: HDF5 datasets and python scripts to generate figures in "Butterfly distribution of relativistic electrons driven by parallel propagating lower band whistler chorus waves" RBW simulation datasets in HDF5 format: 300pT.h5 The particle dataset to generate the figures. Python scripts to generate figures in the manuscript. - Environment: Python 3.6.7 :: Anaconda 4.4.0 (64-bit) - Required modules: matplotlib, numpy, h5py Figure1.py Generate figure 1. Figure2.py Generate figure 2. Figure3.py Generate figure 3. Figure4.py Generate figure 4. QLDe.py Calculate bounce averaged diffusion coefficients according to Shprits et al. (2006) (doi: https://doi.org/10.1029/ 2006JA011725).
